page_content: This page discusses general water supply projects and planning in municipalities within the Basel-Landschaft canton, offering guidelines and regulations to ensure adequate water supply.
The page provides contact information for local heritage preservation officers in the Basel-Landschaft canton, Switzerland, for different municipalities.

The page outlines the process and requirements for changing shareholders in a GmbH, including the necessity for written form and entry into the commercial register, with links to related forms and guidelines.
